text: Nicolas Den Hane was a bailiff of Vlamertinge around the beginning of the 14th century (1300s). He was mentioned in an investigation of the Vierschaar of Veurne. He had to resolve a conflict between some citizens of Vlamertinge and Jan Vander Kerckhove, the bailiff of nearby Poperinge. The conflict was about defining two Flemings' grounds.Vlamertinge in the 1300s. == References == Category:People from West Flanders Category:Year of death missing Category:1300s births
title: Nicolas Den Hane
